Menagerie:HuntersKnife.NAME: Hunter's Knife
Menagerie:HuntersKnife.FLAVOR: A knife used for skinning after a successful hunt, sharp-edged and hungry.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you kill a non-minion normal enemy, gain #b5 gold.

Menagerie:ShiftingBlessing.NAME: Shifting Blessing
Menagerie:ShiftingBlessing.FLAVOR: The blessing of the moon, ever shifting.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each odd turn, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength. At the start of each even turn, gain #b1 temporary #yDexterity.

Menagerie:Aurumvore.NAME: Aurumvore
Menagerie:Aurumvore.FLAVOR: What does it do with the gold it eats?
DESCRIPTIONS: Eats half your current gold and half of gold you gain. For every #b{0} gold eaten, start each combat with #b1 #yStrength.

Menagerie:GrandMagusSpellbook.NAME: Grand Magus's Spellbook
Menagerie:GrandMagusSpellbook.FLAVOR: Filled with doodles of hybrid beasts.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat and every #b{0} turns thereafter, add one of the Grand Magus's spells to your hand. NL At the start of combat, shuffle a #rCurse into your draw pile.

Menagerie:MalignantTentacle.NAME: Malignant Tentacle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the second turn and every #b{0} turns thereafter, gain {1} #yConstricted.
NL Per turn: #b{0} NL Per combat: #b{1}

Menagerie:GhostlyEgg.NAME: Ghostly Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck that #yExhausts or is #yEthereal, #yUpgrade it.

Menagerie:ExplorersFlag.NAME: Explorer's Flag
Menagerie:ExplorersFlag.FLAVOR: Always looking for the next frontier.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a #y? room, heal #b{0} HP.
